original_title: Iggy Pop And The Stooges: Raw Power Live - In The Hands Of The Fans
overview: Through an online contest, six fans are selected to film Iggy & the Stooges' legendary reunion September 3, 2010 performing "Raw Power" to a stunned crowd at the All Tomorrow's Parties Festival. Following the performance, the fans meet and interview the band. Experience the fan's journey and joy as they witness a classic performance and meet their heroes face to face.
title: Iggy Pop And The Stooges: Raw Power Live - In The Hands Of The Fans
